original_text: In my kingdom you will sit at my table. You will eat and drink with me. You will sit like kings on thrones. You will judge the people of the 12 tribes of Israel.’
korean_text: 너희로 내 나라에 있어 내 상에서 먹고 마시며 또는 보좌에 앉아 이스라엘 열두 지파를 다스리게 하려 하노라

sentences.original_text: you will sit at my table
You will eat and drink with me
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 나와 함께 먹고 마실 것이다

sentences.original_text: You will sit like kings on thrones
